com.otk.jesb.resource.builtin.OpenAPIDes.name: Greetings
com.otk.jesb.resource.builtin.OpenAPIDes.text:
openapi: 3.0.4 info: title: Swagger Petstore - OpenAPI 3.0 description: |- This is a sample version: 1.0.0 paths: /greeting: get: operationId: greetingByName parameters: - name: name in: query required: true schema: type: string responses: '200': description: successful operation content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Greeting' '400': description: Invalid status value default: description: Unexpected error content: application/json: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error" /greetingHistory: get: operationId: listGreetings responses: '200': description: successful operation content: application/json: schema: type: array items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Greeting' '400': description: Invalid status value default: description: Unexpected error content: application/json: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
components: schemas: Greeting: type: object properties: message: type: string example: Hello John! Error: type: object properties: code: type: string message: type: string required: - code - message
